## Portfolio.saveAllMetadata() method

Iterate over all Albums in the portfolio and write the computed metadata for each to disk.

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveAllMetadata(computePath: (a: Album) => string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

computePath


</td><td>

(a: [Album](./photo-dir-to-json.album.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; string


</td><td>

a function that accepts an Album parameter and returns the full path where the album's JSON metadata will be written.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example

Write all metadata to files based on album's directory name

```ts
import { Portfolio } from 'photo-dir-to-json';
import { join } from 'path';

const path = '/Volumes/Photos/Portfolio';
const output = '/srv/website/photo-data';

const portfolio = new Portfolio(path, {
  metadataFile: '_metadata.json',
});

await portfolio.saveAllMetadata((album) => {
  return join(output, `${album.name.toLowerCase()}.json`);
});
```
